oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mayor Briley presenting the Armed Forces Day Proclamation, 1965 May 11
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nashville Mayor Beverly Briley presenting the Armed Forces Day Proclamation to the military officials on May 11th, 1965. The first Armed Forces Day was celebrated nationally on May 20, 1950 and the tradition continues on the third Saturday of May each year, as the country pauses to recognize all active duty men and women serving in every branch of the United States military. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 3 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
